findings.title: Out-of-bounds crash in extract_claims
findings.description: The `strip_custom_section` function does not sufficiently validate data and crashes when the range is not within the buffer, potentially causing an isolated crash of the Elixir process.

findings.title: Stack overflow while enumerating containers in blobstore-fs
findings.description: The all_dirs function is vulnerable to a stack overflow caused by unbounded recursion, triggered by either the presence of circular symlinks inside the root of the blobstore or the presence of excessively nested directory inside the same.

findings.title: Denial of service in blobstore-s3 using malicious actor
findings.description: An attacker could send specially crafted responses that cause `stream_bytes` to continue looping, causing `send_chunk` to report that no errors were detected while also reporting that no bytes were sent.

findings.title: Unexpected panic in validate_token
findings.description: The function receives an untrusted malicious input that forces the program to panic.

findings.title: Incorrect error message when starting actor from file
findings.description: The error message when starting an actor from a file contains a string interpolation bug that causes the message to not include the fileref content.
